author: tokyoya (東京耶)
content:
公司名稱，統編: 泰錸科技有限公司，52301203


公司地址: 台北市松山區敦化北路207號


職缺:DPDK Engineer


職缺能力經歷要求:

Timeline Technologies is looking for engineers who have developed high
performance solutions in DPDK ( Data Plane Development Kit ) to join our
technology team.  As a key member of the technology team, you will work
closely with others developers, researchers, and traders.  Our developers are
focused on improving and expanding the capabilities of our low-latency
trading system which includes:

  - Trade Engine and Backtesting
  - Exchange Connectivity and Infrastructure
  - Strategy Monitoring and Reporting Tools
  - Compliance and Risk Verification

Timeline Technologies was founded in 2016 as an quantitative research and
technology firm.  We are active in several markets in Asia and are excited to
add more technical expertise to our team.  The work will be challenging,
fast-paced, and competitive.  Timeline Technologies is a flat organization,
where ideas flow freely throughout the firm.  A financial background is not
necessary, rather we are looking for self-motivated engineers that have
applied new technologies to solving challenging problems.


What we’re looking for

  - Experience with DPDK environment to implement low-latency network
solutions
  - Deep familiarity with Linux kernel and network protocols
L2/L3/L4-Ethernet/IP/TCP/UDP
  - Strong C programming skills


員工是否需自備工具? : 否


薪資:年薪200萬以上

薪資(保證最低年薪，必填項目): 15 個月


年終獎金計算方式:全薪計算


工時:
每日工作時間: 9:00AM~6:00PM (八小時)  中午休息(12:00~1:00)
每周工作時間: 8*5=40小時


加班費制度：比照勞基法規定


工作福利:年假12天、健身房月費補助、每季員工家庭聚餐、不定期聚餐、
         手足球、無限量辦公室點心及飲品


公司分紅與獎金: 依上季營收每季分發


公司介紹:

**鼓勵員工創造及表現**

-靈活管理
我們尊重每個人的獨特性，也相信每個人擁有的潛力，
在工作上提供高度自由的空間，不吝給予員工創造能發揮專長的機會

-獎勵表現
公司利潤是員工創造的，所以公司在福利及獎金制度上也不會讓表現優秀的員工失望，
我們也鼓勵並支持員工持續學習，讓公司不斷茁壯


**提供優質健康的工作環境**

-舒適辦公設備
符合人體工學的Herman Miller辦公椅，搭配可調整高度的電動辦公桌，
大幅降低身體的負擔，讓員工能舒適地工作

-健身房月費贊助
只要5分鐘左右的路程，就可以到達設備完善的健身房，
期望員工透過規律的運動，讓工作更有效率、身體更健康


人資或徵才聯絡方式:

請mail您的cv至


--

title: [徵才] 泰錸科技徵求DPDK Engineer
